channel.title: EpiCraft - Australia & The World
channel.description:
[img]http://server-wow.ru/epicraft.png[/img]
[size=18pt][color=purple][font=impact]Welcome to EpiCraft - Australia and The World[/font][/size] Survival - Challenge - PVP - NONPVP Survival - Community Contest - Conquest - RPG - Free Build
[color=purple]Server IP: epicraft.jestservers.com
NEW 24/7 dedicated Australian managed / World Wide lag free server invites you to join our 300+ community. Settle in to the world with several builds, ranks and be helped by our dedicated, mature staff. We use all standard plugins including world edit, world guard, latest CB, essentials, Log Block and the works. The server is very unique in that all our staff are recruited carefully to make your stay a good one.
This Saturday 29th join us for halloween celebrations with competitions and prizes for such things as Best Halloween Skin, Best Scary Build and more. Visit www.minecraft.org.au to register and learn more.
Server ip: epicraft.jestservers.com
Looking forward to seeing you there:)
With Thanks,
Wornox
